Welcome to Jekyll!

You'll find this post in your _posts directory - edit this post and re-build (or run with the -w switch) to see your changes! To add new posts, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention: YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext.

Jekyll also offers powerful support for code snippets:

def print_hi(name)
  puts "Hi, #{name}"
end
print_hi('Tom')
#=> prints 'Hi, Tom' to STDOUT.

Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll's GitHub repo.

About

Justin Barr Young designs and develops user experiences for web and mobile products.

He's the principal UX designer and information architect (and occasional front-end developer) at Media Temple, a webhosting and support provider. He designs and guides the creation of user experiences that make Media Temple's products easy and valuable for users. On the side, he designs and develops Two Words For, an online arts and literary magazine (and a constantly-changing work in progress).
